plot: When Mr. Gough, an undertaker, sees the image of Barbara's face printed in the eyes of a drowned man, he sets about capturing her image for himself.
title: Preserve
plot_es: When Mr. Gough, an undertaker, sees the image of Barbara's face printed in the eyes of a drowned man, he sets about capturing her image for himself.
plot_en: When Mr. Gough, an undertaker, sees the image of Barbara's face printed in the eyes of a drowned man, he sets about capturing her image for himself.
